code_value: Questions 1~2  On your way to school, you see an old lady slip and fall to the ground. You go up to her and ask her two questions.</br>Questions 3~4  You are talking with Tom, a friend from Australia, about the rules and regulations in his school. You ask him two questions.
Questions 1~2  On your way to school, you see an old lady slip and fall to the ground. You go up to her and ask her two questions.
Questions 3~4  You are talking with Tom, a friend from Australia, about the rules and regulations in his school. You ask him two questions.
